title: Graduate SDE Intern @Dell EMC
description: SDE Intern in VxRail VxSEALs Research and Development Team

title: Research Assistant @UMass Vision Lab
description:
-Research the concept of visual common sense to perform successful inference about what is invisible, conditioned on what is visible.
-Purposed new benchmarks and optimized algorithms using features extracted from deep learning network layers.
-Ran Experiments of proposed models on multiple tasks include feature-based text recognition, unsupervised learning over classification model, and visual analysis on robotics navigation

title: Research Assistant @UMass RIPPLES Group
description:
-Research on solutions on portable automatic-scheduling lecture capturing, processing, streaming and management system
-Developed and maintained the capturing scheduling and management system, the integration with front-end team and data storage using C++, Python and Qt Framework
-Optimized the product to handle scheduling, capturing, processing and streaming lecture and other visual-aid sources on Raspberry Pi, a portable and inexpensive platform

title: Data Mining Engineer Intern @ Xtalpi Inc.
description:
-Implemented tools that fetch data from online patent libraries, process and classify graphs, and extracts graph data using Python and Computer Vision algorithms.
-Analyzed XRPD and Raman Shift Graphs and extract critical values of small molecule drugs to help the scientists estimate crystal forms and properties with over 1,000,000 instances. The proposed model achieved an accuracy of about 90 percent.

title: Research Assistant @UMass AMRL
description:
-Developed an educational website to simulate, compare and visualize Probabilistic Robotics Localization models
-Analyzed performances of Monte Carlo Localization with Particle filter for robot localization using Javascript

title: Remote Project Lead @Mengyin Group
description:
-Built an outsourcing hiring information management system with chatting functionality via a chat bot using Google Framework that based on QQ, a social media platform by Tencent.
-The application resolves the communication barriers between employers and employees. Pushed to production and have about 4000 clients and maximum of 200 active users within 24 hrs

title: Remote Android SDE @Mengyin Group
description:
-Worked on a mobile application that records time arrangement of the user with statistical analysis and evaluation over time distributions on certain behaviors.
-Implemented the whole application including user interface, Service layer and Data management.
-As of Feb 2017, the project has about 30 Alpha testers from various countries
